Law talisman

Item ID1458

The law talisman is a talisman used to access the Law Altar located on Entrana for the purpose of runecraft. It can also be combined with a silver tiara by using the tiara on the Law Altar with the talisman in your inventory, resulting in a law tiara. Once inside the altar a player can make law runes. This requires 54 Runecraft.

The law talisman is a reward for completing the Troll Stronghold quest, and can be acquired again from Dunstan in Burthorpe for 1000 coins each if lost or if you want to have spare talismans.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 March 2022
(update)

Law talisman were added to Apprentice Felix's shop.

23 May 2013
(update | poll)

Dunstan will now sell you additional law talismans, provided you have fewer than 5 law talismans and law tiaras in total.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.

29 May –
11 June 2007

The "Drop" option was replaced with a "Destroy" option.

24 August 2004
(update)

The item was made obtainable as a reward from Troll Stronghold.

29 March 2004
(update)

The item was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2, but remained unobtainable.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.
